Savior_History: <Part=1>§b<???> A human...? It's been so long since anyone came here...<Part=End> <Part=2>§b<???> You must be wondering who I am, or what you can loot or kill around here, right? Human.<Part=End> <Part=3>§b<???> I am Tashia Dolrein. I used to be quite famous, back in the day.<Part=End> <Part=4>§c<Tashia Dolrein> Before those traitors sealed me away...<Part=End> <Part=5>§b<Tashia Dolrein> But I imagine you don’t know me — it has been a looooong time.<Part=End> <Part=6>§b<Tashia Dolrein> Let’s skip the boring story and all that blah blah blah. I want to make a deal with you, human.<Part=End> <Part=7>§b<Tashia Dolrein> I’ll give you the recipe to my power — something that brushes the edge of the divine...<Part=End> <Part=8>§b<Tashia Dolrein> It’s just a simple gauntlet. Once you craft it, return to me and I’ll teach you how to enhance it.<Part=End> <Part=9>§c<Tashia Dolrein> To become someone as terrifying as I am...<Part=End> <Part=10>§b<Tashia Dolrein> Good luck, human.<Part=End> <Part=11>§b<Tashia Dolrein> Welcome back, my dear apprentice...<Part=End> <Part=12>§b<Tashia Dolrein> Though I can barely see with these eyes carved in stone, I can feel — you trusted me... and forged the gauntlet.<Part=End> <Part=13>§b<Tashia Dolrein> But as you’ve likely noticed, it’s still just a shell. Its true power remains dormant...<Part=End> <Part=14>§b<Tashia Dolrein> To awaken it, you’ll need to perform certain... sacrifices.<Part=End> <Part=15>§b<Tashia Dolrein> After all, the essence of my power is rooted in sacrifice — it feeds on souls to grant your every desire.<Part=End> <Part=16>§b<Tashia Dolrein> Now... touch me with the gauntlet, and I shall grant you my blessing.<Part=End> <Part=17>§b<Tashia Dolrein> Very well... Now that I’ve blessed your gauntlet, you are ready to receive the Soul Gem.<Part=End> <Part=18>§b<Tashia Dolrein> A special gem that will awaken the gauntlet’s true power. But as I said before... sacrifices will be required.<Part=End> <Part=19>§c<Tashia Dolrein> Eliminate 100 of those filthy Villagers.<Part=End> <Part=20>§b<Tashia Dolrein> Until next time, my dear apprentice...<Part=End> <Part=21>§b<Tashia Dolrein> Hello again, my dear apprentice.<Part=End> <Part=22>§b<Tashia Dolrein> The moment you reaped those 100 wretched souls, I felt a wave of power surge through the stone that binds me.<Part=End> <Part=23>§b<Tashia Dolrein> I almost felt my mouth curl into a smile of joy... and then I remembered — I’m a statue.<Part=End> <Part=24>§b<Tashia Dolrein> Now that you possess the gem, I shall grant you the recipe for the true §6Soul Gauntlet.<Part=End> <Part=25>§b<Tashia Dolrein> Ah, how quickly you’ve grown... I said I would make a deal, and I kept my word.<Part=End> <Part=26>§b<Tashia Dolrein> And what do I want in return? Why... absolutely nothing. Just enjoy the gift I’ve given you.<Part=End> <Part=27>§b<Tashia Dolrein> Have fun harvesting those trembling, delicious souls... Each one brings you closer to true greatness.<Part=End> <Part=28>§b<Tashia Dolrein> And perhaps... brings me closer to mine, too.<Part=End> <Part=29>§b<Tashia Dolrein> Until we meet again... and of that, I am certain.<Part=End><Part=30><Part=End>
